detail_desc: Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and an opening with crossover straps and a decorative knot at the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a high waist, pleats at the front for added width and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

prod_name: PELLE Basic S/S jersey polo SB
detail_desc: Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Soft, organic cotton jersey shorts in various designs.
Jacket in cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, side pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Boxy puffer jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zipped chest pocket, side pockets with a press-stud, a loose yoke at the back with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and imitation leather details. Slightly longer at the back with a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Single-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 5.5 cm.
Waist-high hipster briefs in lace and mesh with a lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets, narrow, concealed elastication at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Long dress in airy, lightly crêped, softly draping chiffon. Flounce-trimmed V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the bottom and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and on the skirt to create tiers. Lined.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidery on the front and ears on top. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 14x30x45 cm. The polyester content of the backpack is recycled.
Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. V-neck at the front with shaped cups, and a cut-out section and tie at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in printed jersey.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with short sleeves, elastication at the top and slits with ties at the sides. Unlined.
Long jumper in a soft double knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back and an imitation leather appliqué at the front.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and side stripes.
Printed poncho top with butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere.
Thin bomber jacket in patterned satin with a small, ribbed stand-up collar containing glittery threads and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Chiffon lining.
Slim-fit jeans in different colours of stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Metal wallet chain with a carabiner hook at each end. Length 65.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with covered elastication and a sewn-in belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit T-shirt in slub cotton yarn with an open chest pocket with roll edge, seam centre back and roll edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with a zip at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in a heavily draping weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Straight-style top in sturdy, striped cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Shirt in a softly draping, jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Sleeveless, fitted, knee-length jacket dress in a linen and viscose weave with notch lapels and a wrapover front. Two concealed press-studs, a detachable D-ring belt at the waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and a short slit at the back. Lined.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details and a padded, ankle-height shaft with a faux fur trim. Adjustable elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in one side and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Top in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and ribbed cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Sports tights in jersey with a print motif, contrasting colour seams, visible elastic at the waist and a zip at the hems.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and mesh panels in the sides.
Fine-knit, shaftless socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Loose yoke in satin embroidered with long sparkly stone chains. Lightly padded shoulders and a short zip at the back. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, small embroidery detail at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairband in a soft, textured knit.
Knee-length dress in a soft weave with short, frilled sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Chelsea boot-style trainers in printed canvas with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles, rubber soles.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.
Sleeveless cotton jersey dresses in various designs with a gathered seam at the waist.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative pompoms on the front.
Jersey jumpsuit in a cotton and modal blend with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, a smocked bodice, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim with appliqués. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs that finish just above the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and a lace trim at the top.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Textured top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Twisted seams at the front and short slits in the sides.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with a mesh detail and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Regular Fit.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, double-layered wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length, straight-cut dress in a softly draping weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-neck with a concealed button at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with a shiny metal button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Kimono in patterned satin with low dropped shoulders and a detachable tie belt.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck, plastic ring with a hammered metal look at the front and a fastening at the back. Triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Cut-out sections at the back and sides, and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Long, bell-shaped skirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with buttons down the front. Unlined.
Jacket woven in a linen blend with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trim at the hem in a cotton weave.
